title: LoL Chat Bug URGENT
body:
I can't "Reconnect to chat".
It says this:
Unknown Error
An unknown error has occurred
sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server.
If you keep encountering this error you may want to check the support site or forum for more information.

What do i do?

I've tested to see if it was my computer but when i try log into my LoL chat app it doesn't work on there either!

replies.body:
Hey there,

There is currently a known issue affecting chat, network operations are currently working on the problem.

For further updates, see the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) page.

>Network Operations â€“ 12:17 PM
We're aware of a problem causing chat to have issues, and are working on a fix.
